page.title: APPLICATIONS
page.content:
Applications

TWG offers a wide range of industry-specific solutions for several key industrial markets, including Infrastructure, Recovery, Energy and Marine. Our diverse range of products can also be customized for use in other markets like Agriculture and Aerospace.

Leveraging smart ideas and sophisticated technology, TWG solutions provide reliable performance, make your job easier, and increase ROI. Our tools and technologies allow operators and managers to maximize production while reducing downtime in the most challenging, high-pressure environments.

Applications

TWG offers a wide range of industry-specific solutions for several key industrial markets, including Infrastructure, Recovery, Energy and Marine. Our diverse range of products can also be customized for use in other markets like Agriculture and Aerospace.

Leveraging smart ideas and sophisticated technology, TWG solutions provide reliable performance, make your job easier, and increase ROI. Our tools and technologies allow operators and managers to maximize production while reducing downtime in the most challenging, high-pressure environments.

[ps2id id=’application-intro’ target=’application-intro’/]Infrastructure

TWG products and components are custom designed for use in a wide variety of infrastructure applications. From hoists, load moment indicators, Gear drives and slewing ring bearings for cranes, to rotators and traction winches for aerial lifts and digger derricks, our cutting-edge solutions are built for efficient, long-lasting service, giving you a high return on investment.

Learn More

Infrastructure

TWG products and components are custom designed for use in a wide variety of infrastructure applications. From hoists, load moment indicators, Gear drives and slewing ring bearings for cranes, to rotators and traction winches for aerial lifts and digger derricks, our cutting-edge solutions are built for efficient, long-lasting service, giving you a high return on investment.

Learn More

[ps2id id=’application-intro’ target=’application-intro’/]Recovery

Whether they’re called on for commercial or military-related recovery tasks, TWG products and components are engineered for a wide range of uses, including vehicle and equipment recovery, towing, and transport. From planetary winches and gear drives for heavy-duty recovery/rotators, to worm gear winches for small wreckers and trailers, TWG offers tough, reliable solutions that meet any challenge.

LEARN MORE

Recovery

Whether they’re called on for commercial or military-related recovery tasks, TWG products and components are engineered for a wide range of uses, including vehicle and equipment recovery, towing, and transport. From planetary winches and gear drives for heavy-duty recovery/rotators, to worm gear winches for small wreckers and trailers, TWG offers tough, reliable solutions that meet any challenge.

LEARN MORE

[ps2id id=’application-intro’ target=’application-intro’/]Energy

From winches and hoists for drill rigs, to hydraulic pump drives for thumper trucks, to pipelayers, TWG’s cutting-edge solutions are engineered to perform under pressure. Custom designed for use in a wide variety of energy sector applications, TWG products and components include complete streamlined solutions for both onshore and offshore equipment and machinery.

Learn More

Energy

From winches and hoists for drill rigs, to hydraulic pump drives for thumper trucks, to pipelayers, TWG’s cutting-edge solutions are engineered to perform under pressure. Custom designed for use in a wide variety of energy sector applications, TWG products and components include complete streamlined solutions for both onshore and offshore equipment and machinery.

Learn More

[ps2id id=’application-intro’ target=’application-intro’/]Marine

Used in a wide variety of marine applications, TWG products are custom designed for power, efficiency, and long-lasting reliability. From winches and hoists for fishing boats, to hydraulic pump drives for dredges and tugboats, our cutting-edge marine solutions are engineered to give you optimal performance under the harshest of conditions.

LEARN MORE

Marine

Used in a wide variety of marine applications, TWG products are custom designed for power, efficiency, and long-lasting reliability. From winches and hoists for fishing boats, to hydraulic pump drives for dredges and tugboats, our cutting-edge marine solutions are engineered to give you optimal performance under the harshest of conditions.

LEARN MORE

[ps2id id=’application-intro’ target=’application-intro’/]Custom applications

In addition to the four key markets served by TWG, many of our products can be customized for use in applications in other markets. Our engineers can custom-design planetary winches, planetary hoists, planetary gear drives, slewing ring bearings, rotators, and electronic monitoring equipment for the specific needs of equipment operators and managers. Contact us to learn more.

CONTACT US
